meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>big</kanji> <kanji>approximation</kanji> is when I say something <vocabulary>in general</vocabulary>. I'm <vocabulary>mainly</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>mostly</vocabulary> telling everything.
